Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory737.jpg'}
{3: 'To your surprise, the residents you "saved" do not look happy after you chased the Aurora Squadron away.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Disappointed Man', 3: 'Dammit... Did we miss the chance?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Disappointed Man', 3: 'Why? Why would you do this?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Disappointed Man', 3: 'The gentlemen promised us water and food and warm clothes...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Echo', 3: 'Those things came with a price! They were going to experiment on you—', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Disappointed Man', 3: 'No one cares!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Disappointed Man', 3: 'The gentlemen told us we could become their family as long as we followed their rules!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Disappointed Man', 3: 'Why would you stop us from entering Utopia?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "Those people have left. You can't go to Utopia today.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "Go back to the conservation area. It's late now. This place isn't safe anymore.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The disappointed resident glares at Echo, but Echo ignores him as if she is used to it.'}
{2: '...Do you really think such a good thing exists?', 3: '22'}
{2: 'Disappointed Man', 3: 'Certainly! They promised us! We just needed to follow them...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'You wanted to follow them... because you want to live, right?', 3: '24'}
{2: 'Disappointed Man', 3: "Who doesn't want to live? Do you think only big shots like you deserve to live in this world?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Disappointed Man', 3: 'We... we also want to live!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Commandants and soldiers fight. Farmers farm.', 3: '27'}
{2: 'Everyone has to work hard to survive.', 3: '28'}
{2: 'The conservation area offers the same if you work hard.', 3: '29'}
{2: 'Water, food, warm clothes, and more.', 3: '30'}
{2: 'Do you really want to be their "family," or are you just lazy?', 3: '31'}
{2: 'Disappointed Man', 3: 'You—!', 4: '1'}
{2: "Accusing others won't get you away from your own problems.", 3: '33'}
{2: "You already believe what she said, don't you?", 3: '34'}
{3: 'Why else have they stayed instead of running away with the Aurora Squadron?'}
{3: 'The woeful man walks away angrily, no longer berating Echo. He joins a few other residents and begins the way back to the conservation area.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Echo', 3: 'A few are missing...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'Did they leave with the Aurora Squadron?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'They were stealthy and joined the soldiers as they left hastily.'}
{3: 'Echo lets out a quiet sigh.'}
{3: "Some people are definitely seeking an easier life in this world, while others are at their wits' end, no longer motivated to go forward."}
{3: 'Instead of an "easier life," it\'s more like a way out.'}
{2: 'Stop overthinking it.', 3: '50'}
{3: 'Echo sighs again.'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "...Right. I haven't thanked you yet, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: '...When I escaped Constellia and decided to look for Lena, I found a bunch of conservation areas like this one.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'Pickman hasn\'t given up on his plan. He\'s taking advantage of the mobility of his flying fortresses to build many incomplete "Utopias" like this everywhere.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Echo', 3: 'They usually indoctrinate the residents by enticing them with plentiful resources. They tell them they can become their "family" if they follow their rules, and the well-behaved ones can enter their "Utopia".', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'I saved some residents like them before, but none of them believed a word I said.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'You were the only one... who spoke up for me. Thank you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Remember the story you told me?', 3: '62'}
{2: 'Justice is bound to echo through the land.', 3: '63'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory763.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cecily', 3: "Don't be afraid, Alisa.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cecily', 3: 'Justice is bound to echo through the land. The storm might have invaded the skies, but the sun will shine on us again one day.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory762.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryGoldDustBrokenLightWall.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "There's nothing to worry about.", 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Even when the rules here begin to crumple. Even when you are trapped in this quagmire.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "At least you're still alive. You can still dismantle everything.", 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "There's no time to waste. Let's go.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Blurry memories linger in her M.I.N.D. Something has been shattered in her heart, only to become the foundation of a stronger wall.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryGoldDustBrokenLightWall.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory737.jpg'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'Ah... sorry, I got carried away. What were you saying?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'We can follow the trails of the Aurora Squadron to their base.', 3: '90'}
{2: "Time is short. Let's go.", 3: '91'}
